activities: We will be contacting customers in the United Kingdom on behalf of the Mark Group UK and conduct a survey regarding the home energy efficiency inspection process.
personaldata: All personal data is covered under the Safe Harbor Framework.  We will be contacting customers in the UK and conducting follow up a survey.  The personal data that we will have access to is the customer’s name, telephone number and address.  When the customer agrees to and answers the questions the information provided will be entered into our secure server and shared with the Mark Group UK.
